import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

# Create an Account Output

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

1. Instantiate a [Wallet](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Create an [account output](TODO add link to account output explanation) by calling the [`Wallet.create_account_output()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.create_account_output) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/account_output/create.rs#L43
```

</div>

3. Await for the transaction to be accepted by the network by calling the [`Wallet.wait_for_transaction_acceptance()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.wait_for_transaction_acceptance) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/account_output/create.rs#L46-L48
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Create an [account output](TODO add link to account output explanation) by calling the [`Wallet.createAccountOutput()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet/#createaccountoutput) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/account_output/create.ts#L48
```

</div>

3. Await for the [`Transaction`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Transaction.md) to get confirmed by calling the
[`Wallet.waitForTransactionAcceptance()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#waitfortransactionacceptance)
function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/account_output/create.ts#L52
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Create an [account output](TODO add link to account output explanation) by calling the [`Wallet.create_account_output()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.create_account_output) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/account_output/create.py#L24
```

</div>

</TabItem>
</Tabs>
